title: Ich suche jemanden zu spielen und lernen Deutsch. Ich Bin Platin V
body:
Ich suche jemanden zu spielen und lernen Deutsch.

Ich bin Platin V. ich zwei ACC haben . Ich kann du helfen.

So yee basically i need to learn some german, so I am looking for soemone to do DUO. You help me to improve my german and i help you to get to silver or gold o may be more... I have another acc in bronze.

I am 28 years old, from Spain but living in Berlin

replies.body: Oh my god I would like to chat with a spanish guy but sadly I am already Plat :(

Sounds pretty much like boosting ;)
Well, poor enough when ppl are asking for that, getting what they do not deserve.

I can recommend interpals to learn a language, you can either chat with people and talk with them via skype.
Hi inivte me and i help u to improve ur german tomorrow  my ingame name is mervanos
